description: Browse, summarize, and generate Canva designs directly from Claude
author: Canva
content: Create and manage Canva designs through Claude for automated design generation.
features: Manage brand kits and style guides

steps: Add the Canva server configuration with HTTP transport

installation.claudeCode: claude mcp add --transport http canva https://mcp.canva.com/mcp

useCases: Generate social media graphics at scale

troubleshooting.issue: Rate limit error when exporting designs
troubleshooting.solution: Design Export API allows 10 requests per 10 seconds. Wait for time window to reset before retrying. Implement request queuing with 1-second delays between exports to stay within limits.

troubleshooting.issue: Authentication fails with 401 signature verification error
troubleshooting.solution: Verify your OAuth 2.0 implementation ensures tokens refresh correctly. Check that access token hasn't expired and regenerate from Canva Developer Console if needed.

troubleshooting.issue: Cannot add elements to design - hitting rate limit
troubleshooting.solution: Native Element API allows 20 requests per 10 seconds. Batch element additions where possible and add 500ms delays between individual add operations to avoid throttling.

troubleshooting.issue: Designs not accessible or permission denied errors
troubleshooting.solution: Verify your Canva Pro subscription is active and your account has proper team permissions. Check OAuth scope includes design read/write access and re-authenticate if necessary.
